xml

Class XMLHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • xml.XMLHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

    public class XMLHandler
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
    Callback Handler for SAX-Parser. Parses from the XML-File a List of RuleTree for processing on later in the main parser.
    Author:
    Fabian Gallenkamp

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • startElement

        public void startElement(java.lang.String uri,
                java.lang.String localName,
                java.lang.String qName,
                org.xml.sax.Attributes attributes)
                  throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Receive notification of the start/end of an element. Builds together with endElement(String, String, String) the tree for a grammar rule. Those tree rules are converted into RuleTree- Objects. Then they are added and stored in this object until the document is completely parsed.
        Specified by:
        startElement in interface org.xml.sax.ContentHandler
        Overrides:
        startElement in class org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException

      • createfromXMLNode

        private TreeNode createfromXMLNode(TreeNode parent,
                         org.xml.sax.Attributes attributes)
        Converts the XML-node into an TreeNode.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent tree node parsed out of the XML
        attributes - the attributes of the xml-node-element
        Returns:
        the tree node for the xml node, with the specified type, label
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if type is unknown.

      • getruletrees

        public java.util.List<RuleTree> getruletrees()
        Returns:
        all extracted rule trees in the grammar.
